com.mancas.utils

Class AppUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mancas.utils.AppUtils

  • public class AppUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with some useful methods to treat with system applications
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Manuel Casas Barrado

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String ACCOUNT_ID_KEY

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferredApp

        public static android.content.pm.ResolveInfo getPreferredApp(android.content.Intent intent,
                                                             android.content.pm.PackageManager packageManager)
        Method that check if there is a preferred application to perform the intent given in the intent argument
        Parameters:
        intent - action to perform
        packageManager - a reference to the PackageManager of the application
        Returns:
        the ResolveInfo object relative to the application which is going to perform the action specified in the intent argument

      • getPreferredAppIfAvailable

        public static android.content.pm.ResolveInfo getPreferredAppIfAvailable(android.content.Intent intent,
                                                                        android.content.pm.PackageManager packageManager)
        Method that check if there is a preferred application to perform the intent given in the intent argument
        Parameters:
        intent - action to perform
        packageManager - a reference to the PackageManager of the application
        Returns:
        the ResolveInfo object relative to the application which is going to perform the action specified in the intent argument or null if there is no preferred application

      • showProgress

        public static void showProgress(android.content.Context context,
                                android.view.View status,
                                android.view.View form,
                                boolean show)
        Shows the progress UI and hides the form.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        status - view to show the user the status progress
        form - view of the form which is going to be processed
        show - if true, status progress will be shown

      • getAccountID

        public static long getAccountID(android.content.Context context)
        Retrieve from Android Shared Preferences the account ID.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        Returns:
        the current account ID, or -1 if ID is not defined

        Set the new current account ID
        Parameters:

        id - the ID of the account

        public static long getAccountImageID(android.content.Context context)
        Retrieve from Android Shared Preferences the account image ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the current account image ID, or -1 if ID is not defined

      • readPreference

        public static java.lang.String readPreference(android.content.Context context,
                                              java.lang.String key,
                                              int type)
        Read from Android Shared Preferences the setting key and returns his current value.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        key - the shared preference key
        type - class of the shared preference
        Returns:
        the current value of the shared preference specified in key argument

        Configure an intent to crop an square image
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent to configure
        Returns:
        the configured intent

        public static void galleryAddPicture(android.app.Activity activity,
                                     java.lang.String newImage)
        Send a broadcast in order to add the new image to the gallery
        Parameters:
        activity -
        newImage - the image path to add to the gallery

      • checkNetworkConnection

        public static boolean checkNetworkConnection(android.content.Context context)
        Check if the user is currently connected to the network
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        Returns:
        true if the user has network connection, false if not
